titleStmt.title: An Answer to the Athenian Mercury, vol. 4, numb. 14, concerning infant-baptism with an account of divers queries sent by the author (and some others) to the Athenian Society, which they have not yet answered : to which are added, some remarks by way of reply to their Mercury on the same subject, num. 18, published Novemb. 28.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author and sold by John Harris ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
